name: Alien Insanity
description: Aliens have invaded Earth and these thing are weird. Mechanical steam-powered shells... bipedal robots... flying eyeballs drones... Can this all be real? The aim of each level is simple: Kill all the aliens - then find the exit. 24 mind-bending levels! Create and share mods with the inbuilt level editor.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 32bit or 64bit CPU Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: Most graphics cards supporting OpenGL 2.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
